item.description:
[b]"THE LARGEST AND MOST ACTIVE SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND."

SATURDAY, DECEMBER 11, at SANDY BURR COUNTRY CLUB, 103 Cochituate Rd., Rte. 27S, Wayland. Exit 26, Rte. 20 off Rte. 128/95 to 27S. (508)358-7211.
www.se-4u.com
Free door prizes, raffles and MATCH game prizes.
Dance music 8:30-12 AM.
HUNDREDS OF SINGLES & COUPLES 35-60 y.o.
FREE CHA CHA DANCE LESSONS 7:30-8:30.
Admission is only $13.
Proper business dress required, sports jacket, or tie, for men highly recommended; business or party finery for women.
Call (781)446-0234 for info.
Co-sponsored by the Young Professionals Club and The Single CEOâ€™s Club.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Pam at the door.
item.name: NEW *** "SINGLES WITH STYLE" CHRISTAMS PARTY & DANCE
